title: With good judgment, brave selections and a bit of luck, Eddie Jones' plans are bearing fruit at just the right time
text:
Last Saturday England dispatched the double world champions, New Zealand, in as complete a performance as you will see at that level against that quality of opponent. The extent of England’s domination was a surprise, but the fact that England had it within them was not, at least to anyone that has paid proper attention to how the team has developed under Eddie Jones and not wasted time carping at defects, real or imaginary.

Given where we are now it is even more incredible that some people wrote, in only 2018, that England were on the decline when their long run of wins under Jones came to an end.

In fact, they were only a few players away from being a great team and required the three ever-present...
description: Last Saturday England dispatched the double world champions, New Zealand, in as complete a performance as you will see at that level against that quality of opponent.
